title: Strengthening Web Development Competencies: Enhancing Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers' Skills Through Feedforward Strategy Comparison

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the conceptual difference between feedforward and feedback with over 80% accuracy
Learners can compare the effects of feedforward applied at the outline and draft stages of a math lesson plan
Learners can produce instructional materials applying feedforward strategies with 90% completion through peer evaluation in a mobile environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
